content: Total Backup to Google drive sync
Notifications do not work on Note 10+. I worked with developer but nothing he suggested worked.

recurring bill - repeat logic need to re-develop . 84 days repeatition how to enter ? you must set the option user frendly . let user decide the repetitions period . nos / ( days/ week/month/year) let user select . rest is best
replyContent: You can repeat your bills : Weekly, 2 Weeks, 3 Weeks, 4 Weeks, 5 Weeks, 6 Weeks, 7 Weeks, 8 Weeks, Monthly, 2 Months, 3 Months, 6 Months, Yearly. We will provide 84 days option in next update.

content: Excellent app I've used for several years - NEVER late paying any of my 26 monthly bills.
how do you setup reoccurring payments for bills?
replyContent: Please mail to sfinanceapps@gmail.com. We will send you step by step instructions

content: Well put together works well highly recommend to all very user friendly. A new look would be nice...

Love it! Can adjust reoccurring bills if the amount or date changes which is hard to find, with like apps. Can set end dates in case I need to review at a later time. Graphs to show me what percentage of my money goes where. Can set the reminders as I prefer, which helps me stay on top of my bills instead of paying late fees. The only thing I would change is a option to get rid of receivables as I only care about the expense aspect.
I could not create recurring bills on the paid version as well ..
replyContent: Mail us, we will send you steps to create recurring bills.

content: This is what I have been looking for...almost. you have a templates list so you don't have to fill out same info over and over but no way to copy that template to the bill list. You also have a separate list for recurring bills---why is it separate? Make the recurring payment an option for all bills. Just like calendar apps
I have been using this app for years. Keeps me on track. Love it!
Update : after a few years this app still gets a 5 star rating! I get paid twice a month so this app is perfect for me. I just split my bills between the two pay days and it keeps my bill list handy.
I am unable to set up reoccurring payments without an end date. Frustrating
replyContent: Please mail us, we will guide you.

content: Keeps you organised.
Great

So you fixed the recurrent bill crashing issue, now I have one more issue and all will be perfect with this app. If you've made a partial payment it does not reflect in your remaining balance in list view. Lets say you have $200.00 total remaining to be paid for the month but you just made a $50.00 payment to a bill. The total remaining should only show $150.00 not $200.00. The remaining balance to be paid is going off of the original total of the bill and not including partial payments.
4 stars only cause that big bug you had last update that made the app 80% useless with adding recurring bills or even viewing recurring bills crash, all seems to be good now, thx for the update!
Stopped running when trying to add recurrent bill. Stopped when trying just about anything. Give me my money back!!
I just purchased this app, as I had it on my iPhone and need it again on my new Android, and within 5 minutes (not over exaggerating) it crashed 3 times. Really upsetting that I paid for this.
Great job
I wasted my money on this. I gave it a try and tried to see how helpful it could be to track my bills. It is to confusing for me. Wish i could get my money back....Uninstalled.

I've tried a lot of apps for bills, and this one is very easy to use, specially being able to set your bills to be put in every month automatically.  It's well laid out, even with my big fingers they click on exactly what I was wanting to click.  Would love to be able to connect it with a website so I can look up the bills on either phone or computer depending on where I'm at.  But well made and worth the money to pay for the better version..  It's been months and I still love this app.  Use it all the time, and none of my bills are late, or forgotten about now.  Thanks for the great App.

Awesome App !!!! Always had issues keeping up to date with my finances but with this app and my bank app, i have now (after 38yrs) never missed a payment or went in the red !!!! Thank God !!!! RESPECT !!!!
Very easy to use & fulfills almost all requirements of basic accounting.

This Apps Could Be better, I Purchased The Full Version thinking I would be able to do more such as the bills that are already saved I can't save them as recurring bills. I  knew that I wouldn't even get the full version.

I have tried lots of apps. This one is well organized. It is easy to use. I like the different views and the summary. It takes about as long to set up a bill as it does to set up a contact with name number and email. Lots of options but not so many that the app is complicated and hard to use. A+

Repeating function of bills need  more work. Some of my repeating bills wouldnt show up on the following month. Also adding bills was a mediocre especially the bill date and paid date was redundant. Just simplify the process for goodness sake.
Best app. ever, Bills go out on time
Very useful for those who has to pay lot of bill
I was having trouble figuring out how to do a task on the app so I contacted the company and that same day they contacted me back. They helped me out and went above and beyond. Thanks again!!!
I would love to sync this with my agenda!
I tried other programs and this is the best one by far
Niceee..Searched hundreds of apps and found this simple and perfect ones!!!
